name: SBICAP Securities
overview: SBICAP Securities Ltd (SSL) is a 100% subsidiary of SBI Capital Markets Ltd which is one of the oldest players in the Indian Capital Market and has a dominant position in the Indian primary capital markets. SBI Capital Markets Ltd. commenced broking activities in March 2001 to fulfill the secondary market needs of Financial Institutions, FIIs, Mutual Funds, Banks, Corporates, High Network Industry, Non-residential Investors and Retail domestic investors. SBICAP Securities Ltd. (SSL) is a company, which has been formed to take over the broking operations of SBI Capital Markets Ltd. SSL commenced operations in the first quarter of financial year of 2006-2007.

funding_round.source_description: SOMA Networks Secures Additional $51 Million in Financing
